mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER.MNO, MNAME, EMAIL, CRE_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, M.MNO, M.MNAME, M.EMAIL, M.CRE_DATE FROM( SELECT MNO, MNAME, EMAIL, CRE_DATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY CRE_DATE DESC) M ) MEMBER WHERE MEMBER.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MNO, EMAIL, PWD, MNAME, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES(MEMBERS_MNO_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
